attributes.action: Recognise the Gurkhas right to equal pensions and british citisenship.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the Gurkhas have served our nation to the highest standards of bravery and should receive accordingly the right of being granted equality with all pensionable uk soldiers and the right to be British citizens on request having defended our realm.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
